description.narrative: 1. Project: 62408 Globalist magazine#Globalisti magazine is produced by Changemaker, the youth network of Finn Church Aid. The aim of the magazine is to raise awareness about development issues and encourage young people to engage in advocacy work for glob al justice. Globalisti magazine includes articles about actual themes of development policy as well as about advocacy work of the Changemaker network, especially on peace, economy and the environment.#Globalisti magazine offers information written by youth for youth that can be used as global education material, as well as by creating opportunities for young people to work on and promote the development issues. #Globalisti magazine is published twice a year (January and August). The print run is 3 500 copie s/issue. The magazine is also published as online version and the content is shared on Changemakers webpage and through social media channels.#The magazine is sent to all new members of Changemaker and its available at all events organized or attended by t he network. Teachers can order the magazine via SubjectAid service, to which Changemaker sends about half of the copies of each issue. In addition the magazine is sent to the youth spaces of all parishes of the Evangelical Lutheran Church of Finland. #2. M ain objective and expected results: #Activities and expected results: # All content of the Globalisti magazine done by an editorial group consisting of young volunteers of Changemaker network. The layout done by a graphic artist, who has been working in cl ose contact with the editiorial group. The magazine is printed and distributed as described above.# As a starting point of each magazine, Changemaker organises training for the volunteers, so that they can develop new skills and become more confident of th eir abilities to produce a magazine. # New people to join the editorial group. The editorial group will also have regular meetings throughout the year. # Awareness of youth increased on global development issues#3. Target groups: Globalisti is targeted bo th (1) to youth and young adults (e.g. members of Changemaker network, youth in parishes and schools) as well as (2) to people working with youth and in the field of global education (e.g. teachers, youth workers)#4. The implementing partner: FCAs Changema ker Network in Finland
